functions.tag: {filtered_title: "The Sunken Fate", pages: ["{\"text\":\"Day??\"}", "{\"text\":\"The water calls to me. It bends to my will, yet each spell takes a piece of me I cannot reclain. My skin is changing, pale and slick like the creatures of the abyss. My hand, once stready now tremble with an unfamiliar strenght that doesn't feel my own.\"}", "{\"text\":\"I've seen them before -- the Deeplings, lurking in the sunken ruins, their forms cloaked in the deep hues of the abyss. They move with purpose, as though driven by something unseen. \\n\\nSomeone unseen!\"}", "{\"text\":\"Who are they, or what is it, that commands them? I cannot say. But I know they use the same magic that now courses through my veins. The way they channel the water, bend it to their will -- it is too familiar. Too much like my own.\\n\\nWere they like me once? Human?\"}", "{\"text\":\"I try to stop!\\nI try to resist!\\n\\nBut the water -- my water -- is part of me now.\\n\\nWithout it, I am nothing.\\n\\nWith it, I am doomed.\"}", "{\"text\":\"I don't know how much longer I can write. But if you find this... know that the price of power it steep.\\n.\\n.\\n.\\n.\\n\\nThe Abyss always takes what it is owed. \\n\\n         - Aquamancer\"}"], title: "The Sunken Fate", author: "Aquamancer", resolved: 1}
